record.name: Digital Badge
record.description: Based on public-key cryptography, DigitalBadge provides unique digital identities using digital certificates to authenticate identities and authorize users to access information or applications. DigitalBadge eventually will provide every employee with a digital identity. Almost all applications will be able to identify a user with a single identity instead of the proliferation of usernames, passwords and other forms of identification a worker needs to deal with currently.
record.detailedDescription: Based on public-key cryptography, DigitalBadge provides unique digital identities using digital certificates to authenticate identities and authorize users to access information or applications. DigitalBadge eventually will provide every employee with a digital identity. Almost all applications will be able to identify a user with a single identity instead of the proliferation of usernames, passwords and other forms of identification a worker needs to deal with currently.
